message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on person re-identification, which is a computer vision problem, and proposes a novel deep ReID CNN for feature learning. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of pointwise and depthwise convolutions to efficiently learn spatial-channel correlations, which falls under the category of machine learning. Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with multi-scale features and their aggregation, which could be categorized under multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on existing ReID benchmarks, which could be classified under information retrieval (cs.IR).
